content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Have you started thinking of scaling up your business in Caufield by creating your own website? Or do you already have your business’ website but want to take it to the next level? Whether its for your physical store along Glen Eira Road or an online shop operating in your home at Caufield, Confetti Design can create websites that can help your business grow.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Caufield

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563608289042{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your ecommerce website in Caufield to developing a brand that sells, we have all your web design service needs to help you succeed in your business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563758349330{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

4 Tips on designing your website navigation menu for your Caufield business website

[vc_column_text]

When people visit your website, they probably learned about your business and they are interested to get more information. It is important that once they get to your site, they will immediately and easily get what they are looking for, or else they will abandon your website. Your website navigation menu will be the “go-to” area of your Caufield website visitors, and it should be designed thoughtfully.

Confetti Design’s web design service expertise include designing every aspect of your website, as well as your main navigation menu. We have listed below tips on how to design your navigation menu effectively and keep your customers in your website.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Although we have stated the top tips we have in creating a navigation menu, it will still take a lot of research and labour when designing this portion of your website. When you partner with Confetti Design, the best website design company in Melbourne, you can be assured that our thought process will be the same as yours. The only difference is that we will be the one to do the dirty work, so that you can still focus on your business in Caufield while your website is being built.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608564696{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564536393525{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Evaluate your Caufield business’s goals on building a website

When thinking about the main navigation menu, you should think like a customer. Assess the menu items that are most usable to your customers. Consider what you’re offering to your visitors—if it’s a service you are giving in your Caufield shop, or if you’re offering items that you’re selling in your store. What will your customers look for before they avail of your products or services?

Confetti Design’s Clarity Process uncovers your customer profiles so that you can discover what they need to see in your website. Along with our website developers, we’ve designed numerous navigation menus that our clients and their customers love.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608572404{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564536425393{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Keep it simple

We always say this in all aspects of web design and development—less is more. Do not overcrowd your navigation menu or else your customers will get overwhelmed when they visit your new website for your Caufield business. Five to seven menu items for the main navigation is advisable.

Confetti Design’s principle is for your website to look clean yet elegant and functional. This is why we also take consideration on the number of items in your navigation menu.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608578524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564536455699{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Use menu names that describes what your customers will see

Be straightforward but descriptive with your menu labels. This will also help your website rank higher in search engine results. Think of phrases that are on the top of your visitors’ minds and popular keyphrases. Remember to also think about the whole architecture of your website and how you’ll present its content to your website users.

Confetti Design is a web development company in Melbourne who gives expert advise about what works not only with your navigation menu but also on how to organize your pages altogether. We also look at the factors that can help you rank better against your Caufield competitors by using top of the line SEO techniques—which includes descriptive creating navigation menu.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608585353{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_04aaa.jpg?id=11317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564536485607{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Make your home page easily accessible

Browsing a website page and not knowing how to go back to the home page can be frustrating to a website visitor. Therefore, make sure that your home page is in the main menu item and can easily be found.

Confetti Design’s professional website development knows where to strategically position the home page link in every page of your Caufield business website. We think about the ease of use of your website during the design process, so you can be sure that your customer’s browsing experience is superb.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563758360233{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563758262488{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564536585354{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Caufield, Sandringham, Black Rock, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563758249819{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
